name: REVENGE OF WEAPON
description:
REVENGE OF WEAPON

A short (<5 min) demo showing that PyGame can be used to create fun and relatively performant bullet hell

Made in 3 days for Mini-Jam 111: Colors 2, save for a few bug fixes and features that were broken on submission due to time crunch.

Extract game and run the executable

Content complete original jam submission with bugs and broken features included per jam rules. Updated build fixes issues with a few enemies, high score saving and loading, and adds a pause menu, among other small fixes and tweaks.
